usage.cn: 幸福不是取决于外界环境，它由我们的心态来决定。戴尔卡耐基（Dale Carnegie）
usage.eng: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

usage.cn: 我希望找到这样一个人，即使他知道我有多么疯狂，也不愿意让我变成另外一个模样。
usage.eng: I want someone who knows how completely insane I am and yet wouldn't want me any other way.

usage.cn: 那些对你创业认知没有任何直接帮助的功能，流程，经历，都必须放弃。《The lean start up》.
usage.eng: Remove any feature, process, or effort that does not contribute directly to the learning you seek.

usage.cn: 等我长大了，我要先生一个哥哥，然后再生一个妹妹；以后，哪个臭小子谁敢让我女儿哭，我儿子一定揍扁他。
usage.eng: When I grow up, I want a son first, then a daughter; so my son would beat up any boy that makes my little girl cry.
